name: AUTOCROSS MADNESS (itch)
description:
Driving a muscle car on edgy cliffs?!
Sounds like a bad idea... But actually it's quite fun!
Car physics will make the game-play control easy, but hard to master!

Time to tour the world!
Drive trough beautiful landscapes and go mad into curves or just be a Sunday driver.
Challenge yourself in driving like a mad man as you try to get to the finish line as fast as possible.

Have fun!

DCGsoft TEAM
